fields.name: Usage: /requestrole <role>
fields.value: If the **role** is requestable, this command will give you that **role**. If you already have that **role**, it will be removed instead. Some **roles** may require you to make an agreement before you may receive it.

fields.name: Usage: /requestrole <role> [duration]
fields.value: Some **roles** may only be allowed to be given for a temporary amount of time. For those, the **duration** must be specified. The maximum duration is 30 days.
